service.title: Part 1
service.desc: Building social media platforms,creating the website,successful launch of PONIX,burning LP tokens,creating a community.

service.title: Risk Assessment
service.desc: Financial institutions can use Genom's Document Management Module to assess the credit risk of their customers, which analyzes customer documents and provides detailed information about payment history and financial health.

service.title: Malfunction Assistant
service.desc: An AI-supported chatbot developed using Genom's Document Management and Prompt Management modules analyzes technical service manuals and offers effective solution suggestions for the faulty machine.

service.title: Disease Diagnosis
service.desc: By analyzing health data, the genome platform can help doctors in the early diagnosis of diseases.

service.title: Product Recommendation Systems
service.desc: The platform provides personalized product recommendations based on users' past shopping data and search behavior, thus increasing sales rates.

service.title: Customer Preference Analysis
service.desc: E-commerce platforms develop models that predict customer preferences by analyzing user behavior, which helps optimize marketing strategies.

timeline.title: Phase 1
timeline.desc: Building social media platforms → Creating the website → Successful launch of PONIX → Burning LP tokens → Creating a community

timeline.title: Phase 2
timeline.desc: Engaging in discussions to increase social media relations → Developing decision-making mechanisms with the community →  Reaching 10K Holders → Initiating efforts for the burning mechanism

timeline.title: Phase 3
timeline.desc: Selecting Mysterious Land characters → Starting work on technological applications → Creating a coin on the ERC-20 network → Determining the airdrop strategy

accordion.title: Generative AI Nedir?
accordion.desc: Generative AI, öğrenme algoritmaları kullanarak yeni içerikler oluşturabilen yapay zeka teknolojisidir. Bu teknoloji, dil, görseller, müzik ve hatta program kodları gibi çeşitli biçimlerde içerik üretebilir. Örneğin, metin tabanlı sorulara cevap verme, şiir veya hikaye yazma, resim üretme gibi işlemler generative AI ile mümkündür. Makine öğrenimi modelleri, büyük veri setlerinden öğrenerek insanların yapabileceği benzeri yaratıcı işler gerçekleştirebilir. Bu alanda kullanılan en popüler yöntemlerden biri de derin öğrenme teknikleridir.
